alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Jackson; Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 7:37AM CDT until March 22 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CALDWELL...EASTERN JACKSON AND OUACHITA PARISHES... At 736 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles southwest of Brownsville-Bawcomville, or near Chatham, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Chatham, Eros, Drew, Fondale, Vixen, Bosco, Folksville, Cheniere, Mineral Springs, Caderville, Pine Grove, Luna and Lapine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
